text: Sonotoki arrā wa, 1-ba no dai karasu o noko wa shite ji o hora se, sono otōto no shitai o, ikaga ni ōubeki ka o kare ni shimesa reta. Kare wa itta. `Ā nasakenai kyōdai no shitai o hōmuru no ni, watashi wa kono karasu hodo no koto sae dekinai no ka.' Kōshite kare wa kōkai suru mono no 1-ri to natta
